EmailTemplate.description: Used to Close Loop with Customer regarding Non-Financial Modification request done by Booking Team
EmailTemplate.name: QCC ( Non-Financial Modification )
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Alert: {!Case.Subject} Request Completed - Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We are pleased to inform you that your request for a (refer to QCC matrix) has been completed.
We are in the process of closing resolved cases. Please feel free to reply to this email if you still need help or require more information. Otherwise we will close the case ({!Case.CaseNumber}) after 2 business days.
We are also inviting you take a short survey about our customer service and your SunPower experience. Your feedback helps us understand what you value about our service and where we can serve you better. We will send out another email with a link to the survey.
You may also contact us via https://us.sunpower.com and click on the “How can we help?” button at the bottom of your browser to launch a chat window. Alternatively you can call us at 1-800-786-7693. We’re here for you Monday through Friday from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m PST.
Thank you for giving us the opportunity to assist you.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Customer Service Representative Global Business and Finance Services | office 1-800-786-7693 (SUNPOWER) |
